entry.def: The sameness of something is its lack of variety.

example.ex: He grew bored by the sameness of the speeches.
example.tran: 这些千篇一律的演讲让他心生厌烦。

means.word_mean: 2. the quality of wearisome constancy and lack of variety;

sentences.sentence: "he had never grown accustomed to the monotony of his work"
"he hated the sameness of the food the college served"
